OOC: I agree.  Give it time and wars will break out again.  Once the 
factions reorganize, the wars will be started and fights will 
ensue.  Besides, give me some time. *grins evilly* yess, there will 
be fights breaking out.  So relax and have fun. Remember, all wars 
are not just over survival. Wars are generally political.  So give 
it enough time for things to fall back into place and the old battle 
between US and THEM will resume. 

Logo




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> OOC: Pardon me for this OOC message, but my thoughts on this will 
be expressed. I think the problem here is that there is no one 
taking enough action, number 1, there are no fights and no evil 
plans being cooked up by the evil team. There needs to be wars 
started like in the old days and some interesting stories that can 
affect everyone written as well. Number 2, the character limit 
prevents people from making their own storylines up, and thus people 
usually have to rely on hoping they won't get ignored and waiting 
for their bots to receive orders from the commanders. Things similar 
to this are what killed my first Beast Wars RPG. But hey, I'm not 
telling you anything you don't already know...
>
